HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.Name: UpdateFeatureBase
HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.modNameReadable: Mighty Persona Bond Forge Patch Mod

HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Initial release
Added support for Metal Rim Rising|Fixed some weapon descriptions
Added support for VWE Coilguns - Unnoficial Gauss Sniper
Added support for KEP Blast-Charge Weaponry (Continued)|Updated support for Ilya Tech - Core
Added support for RimVali: Far From Avalon|Fixed incorrect xml
Fixed support for Altherian Export - Elemental Weaponry
Added support for [M.W]Resonant Munitions
Added support for Charged Melee Weaponry
Added support for Cybernetic Storm
Added support for Star Wars - Fully Functional Lightsabers (Continued)
Added support for SNS AOTC: True Pinnacle of Creation
Added support for Vali's Charged Arsenal and Vali's Charged Arsenal - Eltex Series|Removed support for Charged Melee Weaponry
Added support for PlanetsidePew (Continued)
Added support for [RWY]Advanced Mechanoid Warfare
Added support for Oddities: Weapons Module
Fix some xml issues
Fix issue where Mechanoids would try to spawn is a persona bonded weapon
Updated support for Vanilla Factions Expanded - Pirates|Corrected changed mod name
Updated support for Oddities: Weapons Module

Updated support for Vali's Charged Arsenal|Updated support for Vali's Charged Arsenal - Eltex Series|Seperated the RecipeDefs into their own files, does nothing for you but making files easier to manage for me|Cloned the base weapon ThingDefs instead of assigning all weapons BaseWeapon_Bladelink|Removed the need to load after every weapon mod
Added support for Vanilla Weapons Expanded - Laser|Updated support for Vanilla Factions Expanded - Pirates
Added support for Phasers
Fix issue where if a bonded weapon was picked and not equipped it would change it's quality
Added support for Planetside arena weapons
Added support for Rimsenal - Federation Faction Pack
Added support for UncraftableExoticWeapons
Added support for Australden's Fusion Weapons Pack Remastered, The Cosmic Odyssey - Core and The Cosmic Odyssey - Urban Combat
Added support for Hive Rifle, Primaris warcasket armour and weaponry, Ultratech Weapons Plus and Warcaskets: Adeptus Astartes
Added support for Civilization Beyond Earth Armor Sets|Fixed some incorrect xml
Added support for Plasma Weaponry (Continued), Pulse Weaponry and Xcom Advent weapons
Removed the ability for weapons to be Biocodable

Added support for Planetside NSX weapons, Rail Weapons Revived [1.1->1.3], Laser Weapons Revived [1.1->1.3], Vanilla XCOM Laser Weapons, Vanilla XCOM Plasma Weapons, Vanilla XCOM Magnetic Weapons and HALO - UNSC Faction
Added support for Vanilla XCOM Chosen Weapons, Vanilla XCOM Weapons, AQ - Weapons Advanced and PlanetSide Endeavor Weapons
Updated support for Eccentric Tech - Foxy's Armory 2.0|Fixed support for RimVali: Far From Avalon
Updated support for Vanilla Weapons Expanded by removing the patches added by Persona Bond Forge and repatching them myself. All defName's are the same so nothing should break.
Added support for Rim-Effect: Core and Rim-Effect: Extended Cut|Changed how rare weapons are.
Added support for XAR-21 and Zwergy's Spacer Weaponry (Continued)||Note: Future updates will require XML Extensions

Added support for settings via XMLExtensions.||Note: XMLExtensions is not required, but it is if you want to use the settings. Game needs to be reloaded for patches to be applied. Disabling mod patches mid save can cause problems. Be sure to backup save before doing so.
Added 1.4 mod version tag|Removed ability to smelt weapon in v1.4 due to error spam||I will continue to patch weapons for v1.4 but i don't know how stable Persona Bond Forge will be
Fixed support for Polarisbloc - Core LAB weapon trait adjust
Fixed support for Persona Bond Forge by StatistNo1
Tweaked some of the xml
Added support for Kit's VFE Weapons Continued and Call of Duty: Zombies Pack

Added support for Vanilla Weapons Expanded - Laser - M36 Kantrael Pattern Lasgun, Vanilla Weapons Expanded - Laser - Mark 2 Gyro-Stabled Hellgun and Vanilla Weapons Expanded - Laser - N98 Lucius Pattern Lasgun
Added support for TOT's Advanced Weapon Set
Added support for Girl's Frontline: Sangvis Ferri Weapons and Project Fortuna Laser Pack|Tweaked some minor xml
Added support for Destiny Leviathan Weapons (Continued), Expanded Charge Weaponry and Project Fortuna Weapon Pack|Fixed some incorrect bonding recipes
Fixed some xml relating to CompOversizedWeapon
Added support for Sparkling Worlds - Full Mod
Added support for Antimatter Annihilation
Added support for Sparkling Worlds Addon - Weapons - Standalone Addon
Added support for Junior Marine's Armory|Fixed support for Ambition of the Cosmic
Added support for KEP Weapons - Toxic (Continued), pphhyy's Tox Weapons and Sunset Weapon Technology 2
Added support for Tau Armory and Unturned's Focus Rifle
Added support for Beam Katana: Spacer Melee Weapon, Grimworld: Autoguns, Grimworld Lasguns and Grimworld: Melee
Persona Bond Forge mod is no longer required, but it is still required to craft persona weapons. Otherwise persona weapons can be obtained via vanilla means.
Added support for Hellsing ARMS Ultimate
Added support for Destiny 2 Exotic Weapons, Destiny 2 Weapon Package - Fusion Rifle and Seventh Seraph Weapons
Fixed E21 anti-material rifle from Eccentric Tech - Foxy's Armory 2.0
Added support for Vanilla Spacer weapons - Beam Gun, Vanilla Spacer weapons - Bounce Gun and Vanilla Spacer weapons - Explosive Bolt
Fixed XML errors for Call of Duty: Zombies Pack and Vanilla Spacer weapons - Bounce Gun
Added support for Rimsenal - Augmented Vanilla Pack|Fixed some RecipeDef issues
Added support for RimForge
Added support for [LFS] Night Shade Mercenarys and Reinforced Mechanoid 2
Added support for Grimworld: Ogryns and 米娅·SAMA的武器包重制版
Added support for Mechanitor's Weapons|Removed <success> tag from all 1.4 patches|Replaced /Defs with Defs because apparently it's faster when patching
Added support for Eltex Weaponry and PsyBlasters|Fixed issues with Vanilla Weapons Expanded
Added support for Rimlaser
Added support for Imperial Arsenal: Royal Warcasket
Added support for Ancient Arsenal: Warcaskets
Added support for Contractors Arsenal and [SYR] Naga
Contractors Arsenal will only be patched when Persona Bond Forge isn't active, since it's already being patched by Persona Bond Forge
Added support for [RH2] DOOM|Decreased file size of recent patches|Fixed RecipeDef errors
Added support for Wisteria Corporation
Fixed support for [RWY]Advanced Mechanoid Warfare
Removed support for Eltex Weaponry due to Eltex Weaponry adding support
Added support for Paniel the Automata
Added support for [JDS] StarWars - Armory
Added support for RimArchive-In Progress|Removed unwanted extra files

Added support for Rimsenal - Core when Persona Bond Forge isn't active, since it's already being patched by Persona Bond Forge|Repatched Apex: Rimworld Legends (Continued), Australden's Fusion Weapons Pack Remastered, Destiny 2 Weapon Package - Fusion Rifle, Planetside arena weapons, Project Fortuna Laser Pack, USCM - Core, Vanilla Weapons Expanded - Laser - M36 Kantrael Pattern Lasgun, Vanilla Weapons Expanded - Laser - Mark 2 Gyro-Stabled Hellgun, Vanilla Weapons Expanded - Laser - N98 Lucius Pattern Lasgun
Added support for Ancient Charged Arms

Added support for Project Itzal - Lasers (Unofficial 1.4) and TOT's CMC Weaponry|Added support for Vanilla Weapons Expanded - Laser when Persona Bond Forge isn't active, since it's already being patched by Persona Bond Forge

Added support for Kurin, The Three Tailed Fox [Deluxe Edition] and Glitter Weaponry|Removed VWEL_Bullet_LaserRifle_Bond from Vanilla Factions Expanded - Pirates patch since it's now in the Vanilla Weapons Expanded - Laser patch
Added support for RimTrek (Continued) and RimVali: Far From Avalon
Added support for Bill Doors' Plasma Weapons

Added support for Caridion Arsenal (Continued), Charge Guns MKV, Det's Energy Weapons and Project Itzal - Charge Pack|Added support for Cybernetic Warfare and Special Weapons (Continued) when Persona Bond Forge isn't active, since it's already being patched by Persona Bond Forge|Change the unfinished crafting item to UnfinishedGun instead of UnfinishedComponent
Added support for Vanilla Factions Expanded - Empire|Cleaned up some xml
Added support for FCP - Classic Laser Weapons
Fixed support for Vanilla XCOM Chosen Weapons
Added support for Lumin (Continued)
Added support for Bill Doors' Luxury Guns and Vaults of Vagar
Fixed support for Oddities: Weapons Module
Added support for Borderlands: The Rim and [TSC]Terra Space Corps

Added Muzzle Flash support for Planetside arena weapons, PlanetSide Endeavor Weapons, The 13th Vendemiaire, S.T.A.L.K.E.R. - Custom Gauss Rifle, Reinforced Mechanoid 2, Rimsenal - Core, Rimsenal - Augmented Vanilla Pack

Added support for Chemrail and NSIC Space Weapons
Added support for Kraltech Industries and Kraltech Industries LITE|Cleaned up some of the xml
Added support for Cryoweapons
Fix an XML error when Vanilla Factions Expanded - Pirates is loaded
Added support for Obliterator (Continued)
Added support for Signalis Weapon Pack
Added support for GrimWorld 40,000
Fix an XML error with GrimWorld 40,000
Added support for Grimworld 40,000 - Angels of Death and Grimworld 40,000 - Hammer of the Imperium

Added support for Obsidia Expansion persona weapon crafting with custom bench to keep them seperate from Obsidia Expansion weapons|Note: Currently about half of the mods are supported by this, more will be added later
Added support for Mono Weapons Pack
Fix xml error with Moyo-From the depth, Grimworld 40,000 - Hammer of the Imperium, Call of Duty: Zombies Pack and Hellsing ARMS Ultimate
Added support for Charge-Loading Lee-Enfield 1.4 Fork|Fixed some more xml errors
Added support for Vaults of Vagar: Light Bolters|Fix crafting support for Vanilla Factions Expanded - Empire toxblade

Added support for Aliens: Fireteam Elite Armory
Fixed support for Ambition of the Cosmic: True Pinnacle of Creation due to mod name changed

Added support for Imperial arsenal|Added crafting support for Contractors Arsenal patch from Persona Bond Forge for Obsidia Expansion persona crafting|Fixed crafting support for Aliens: Fireteam Elite Armory

Added support for Advanced Laser Weapons and Citizens Edge: Charged Mechanite Rifle|Added crafting support for Cybernetic Warfare and Special Weapons (Continued) patch from Persona Bond Forge for Obsidia Expansion persona crafting

Fixed support for Mono Weapons Pack

Added support for Moyo-Light in the Abyss and Pulse Weaponry
Fixed mod conflict with Pulse Weaponry|Future updates will require XML Extensions

Added support for Vaults of Vagar: Melee Armaments
Added support for Exotic Arsenal (Continued)

Fix a bug where the Persona Bond Forge table didn't have crafting recipes that were adding if Obsidia Expansion was also loaded by Renaming all the patch files by adding a prefix to it, seems you can't have two patch files with the same name
Fix a error with Vanilla Factions Expanded - Vikings
Fix support for Signalis - Weapon

Added support for Quasimorph - Realware™ armoury, Plasma Lance (Continued)|Fix support for Celestial Manufacturing Cooperation MKII|Added tabs in settings to disable crafting support (not all mods support this yet)
Fixed support for Kurin, The Three Tailed Fox [Deluxe Edition]

Added RimWorld 1.5 support for Apex: Rimworld Legends (Continued), AQ - Weapons Advanced, Archotech Rifles, Astartes, Blackhole Industries (Continued), Caridion Arsenal (Continued), Celestial Manufacturing Cooperation MKII, Charge-Loading Lee-Enfield 1.4 Fork, Citizens Edge: Charged Mechanite Rifle, Destiny 2 Exotic Weapons, Destiny Leviathan Weapons (Continued), Exotic Arsenal (Continued), HALO: Rimworld Psychic Pulse Armory (Continued), HALO - UNSC Faction, Hellsing ARMS Ultimate, Hideous Destructor - ZM66 Assault Rifle, Iconian Tech, Impact Weaponry, Moritz's LegendaryWeapons (Continued), Phasers, Planetside arena weapons, PlanetSide Endeavor Weapons, Planetside NSX weapons, PlanetsidePew (Continued), Plasma Weaponry (Continued), Vali's Charged Arsenal (Continued), Vali's Charged Arsenal - Eltex Series (Continued), Vanilla Factions Expanded - Pirates, Vanilla Weapons Expanded - Coilguns, Vanilla XCOM Chosen Weapons, Vanilla XCOM Laser Weapons, Vanilla XCOM Magnetic Weapons, Vanilla XCOM Plasma Weapons, Vanilla XCOM Weapons, Vaults of Vagar, Vaults of Vagar: Light Bolters and Vaults of Vagar: Melee Armaments
Added RimWorld 1.5 support for Star Wars - Fully Functional Lightsaber and Glitter Tech

Added support for Astra Militarum Imperial Guard Core Mod v2.5, Australden's Fusion Weapons Pack Remastered, Bill Doors' Plasma Weapons, Vanilla Friendly Laser Guns (Continued), Ultratech Weapons Plus, Skyrim Daedric Weapons Pack, Skyrim Dwarven Weapons Pack, Skyrim Ebony Weapons Pack, Skyrim Elven Weapons Pack, Skyrim Glass Weapons Pack, Project Itzal - Lasers (Continued), Laser Guns, Arasaka Corporation, Beyond Ultratech: Smart Weapons (Continued), [JDS] StarWars - Armory, [LFS] Night Shade Mercenaries, [RH2] DOOM, Bill Doors' Luxury Guns

Added support for Cerberus Equipment, DyingLight arsenal, Paramount Combat Armaments, Syila fixes RimEffect - Weapons and Armor, Electromagic Weaponry - Railgun, Civilization Beyond Earth, Skyrim Dragonbone Weapons Pack, Skyrim Orcish Weapons Pack, Antimatter Annihilation, Apex: Rimworld Legends (Continued), Arasaka Corporation (Continued), Contractors Arsenal, District 9 Weapon Pack (Continued), Eccentric Tech - Foxy's Armory 2.0, Eccentric Extras - Signature Weapons, Edge of Descension - Vanguard, Exotic Arsenal (Continued), GERZockers Armory, Glitter Tech Classic, Glitter Tech Classic (No Surgery), Glitter Weaponry, GrimWorld 40,000 - Core Imperialis, GrimWorld 40,000 - Hammer of the Imperium, Grimworld 40,000 - Angels of Death, Halo Infinite Armoury, Ion Weaponry, Imperial arsenal, KEP Blast-Charge Weaponry (Continued), Lumin (Continued), Mass Effect Guns (Continued), Mechanoid Reusing 2, Phase Weaponry, Project Itzal - Charge Pack (Continued), Pulse Weaponry, Pulse Rifle Test, Quasimorph - Church Of Revelation armoury, Quasimorph - Civil Resistance armoury, Quasimorph - Realware™ armoury, Spacer Arsenal, pphhyy's Tox Weapons and [LYN] Nanotech Overpower

Added support for Arsenal of Reaction, Arsenal of Revolution, Firearms of Tomorrow, Ambition of the Cosmic, AOTC: True Pinnacle of Creation, Charge Rilfe MKII Jann, KEP Weapons - Toxic (Continued), Local's Lego Star Wars Blasters and Mechanitor's Weapons

Added support for Ancient Charged Arms, Vaults of Vagar: Rayguns, Vaults of Vagar: Medium Bolters, Big and Small - Weapons, Call of Duty: Zombies Pack, Chemplas Weaponry, Cybernetic Storm, Cybernetic Warfare and Special Weapons (Continued), Stellic Arsenal, Pesky's Gauranlen Armory
Fixed support for Eccentric Extras - Signature Weapons

Added support for Vanilla Weapons Expanded, Vanilla Weapons Expanded - Bioferrite, Spacer Arsenal, [1.5] Moyo - from the depth, [1.5] Moyo - Light in the Abyss, [1.5] Moyo - The Cartel Arrives, Zwergy's Spacer Weaponry (Continued), Xeva Faction, XCOM ADVENT Weapons (Continued), Tactical Wizard Breach, Wisteria Corporation (Continued), Vanilla Spacer Weapons - Beam Gun (Continued), Vanilla Spacer Weapons - Bounce Gun (Continued), Added support for Vanilla Spacer Weapons - Explosive Bolt (Continued), VWE Coilguns - Unnoficial Gauss Sniper, USCM - Core
